name: AtomBlitz
description:
Atomblitz is a horizontal scrolling shoot ‘em up video game heavily inspired by the Nokia 3310’s Space Impact and Konami’s Gradius Franchise.

The story takes place in the year 20XX. You, the player, are placed in the role of a pilot tasked to explore the vast reaches of space. Explore deep space as you find new discoveries and maneuver through the challenges of high speed space travel.

NOTE: The project is still in alpha stages of development.
